name: test_minting_one_token[script_file]
description:
Test minting a token with a Plutus script.

        Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

        * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral and possibly reference script
        * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
        * mint the token using a Plutus script
        * check that the token was minted and collateral UTxO was not spent
        * check expected fees
        * check expected Plutus cost
descriptionHtml:
Test minting a token with a Plutus script.

    Uses `cardano-cli transaction build` command for building the transactions.

    * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral and possibly reference script
    * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
    * mint the token using a Plutus script
    * check that the token was minted and collateral UTxO was not spent
    * check expected fees
    * check expected Plutus cost
statusMessage: Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model
statusTrace: ('/home/martink/Source/repos/cardano-node-tests7/cardano_node_tests/tests/test_plutus_v2_mint_build.py', 130, 'Skipped: runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')

tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(True, reason='runs only with Babbage+ TX; needs PlutusV2 cost model')
